metadata.name: The Scream (HUGYAW)
metadata.description:
Dinagyang Festival is one of the biggest and world-class festivals in the Philippines. It traces the history of devotion to the Holy Child Jesus popularly known to Filipino devotees as Sr. Sto. Nino.

This photo shows vivid emotions evident in the image that clearly depicts the strong faith and undying devotion of an Ilonggo to Señor Sto. Niño.

 The paint in the face and the intricate design shows the quintessential aesthetics of rich history and culture of Iloilo and its people.
 
The consistent drive to satisfy and exceed expectations is present on the face of the Ati that can enable one to infer that he urges himself to be the best and win the competition. 

The headdress signifies the will and determination of the Ati, the striking colours shouts the strong and burning faith and devotion of Ilonggos.

Who ever purchase this photo will get an extra Dinagyang Festival photos and will unlock my signature preset.
